verses.text: \w Be|strong="H6440"\w* gracious, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* God, \w be|strong="H6440"\w* gracious \w to|strong="H6440"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w*, \w for|strong="H6440"\w* \w in|strong="H6440"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w I|strong="H6440"\w* take shelter. \w In|strong="H6440"\w* \w your|strong="H6440"\w* sheltering wings \w I|strong="H6440"\w* take refuge, \w till|strong="H6440"\w* ruin \w be|strong="H6440"\w* \w over|strong="H6440"\w* \w past|strong="H6440"\w*.

\w I|strong="H3588"\w* cry \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* Most High God, \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* God \w who|strong="H5315"\w* accomplishes \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w me|strong="H5315"\w*.

\w He|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H7121"\w* send \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H7121"\w* succour \w from|strong="H5921"\w* heaven, \w he|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H7121"\w* thrust away \w those|strong="H5921"\w* \w who|strong="H7121"\w* would trample \w me|strong="H5921"\w*. \qs Selah\qs*

\w In|strong="H8064"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* midst \w of|strong="H8064"\w* lions \w I|strong="H7971"\w* lie, \w who|strong="H3467"\w* \w devour|strong="H7602"\w* human prey. \w Their|strong="H7971"\w* teeth \w are|strong="H8064"\w* spears \w and|strong="H7971"\w* arrows, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w their|strong="H7971"\w* tongue \w is|strong="H2617"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* sharpened sword.

\w Be|strong="H1121"\w* exalted, God, \w o|strong="H3068"\w*’er \w the|strong="H8432"\w* heavens, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w your|strong="H1121"\w* glory \w o|strong="H3068"\w*’er \w all|strong="H7901"\w* \w the|strong="H8432"\w* earth.

\w They|strong="H5921"\w* \w set|strong="H7311"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* net \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* feet, \w but|strong="H3605"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w was|strong="H3605"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* own foot caught. \w Before|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* dug \w a|strong="H3068"\w* pit, \w but|strong="H3605"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w fell|strong="H5921"\w* \w into|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w themselves|strong="H5921"\w*. \qs Selah\qs*

\w My|strong="H8432"\w* \w heart|strong="H5315"\w* \w is|strong="H5315"\w* \w steadfast|strong="H3559"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* God, \w my|strong="H8432"\w* \w heart|strong="H5315"\w* \w is|strong="H5315"\w* \w steadfast|strong="H3559"\w*. \w I|strong="H5315"\w* \w would|strong="H5315"\w* sing, \w I|strong="H5315"\w* \w would|strong="H5315"\w* \w make|strong="H3559"\w* music;
awake, \w my|strong="H3559"\w* soul. Awake, harp \w and|strong="H3820"\w* lyre; \w I|strong="H3559"\w* would wake \w the|strong="H3559"\w* dawn.

\w I|strong="H5782"\w* would praise you among \w the|strong="H5782"\w* peoples, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \nd Lord\nd*, \w and|strong="H3658"\w* make music among \w the|strong="H5782"\w* nations \w to|strong="H3519"\w* you;

\w for|strong="H5971"\w* great \w to|strong="H5971"\w* heaven \w is|strong="H5971"\w* \w your|strong="H3034"\w* love, \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w your|strong="H3034"\w* faithfulness \w to|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H3034"\w* clouds.

\w Be|strong="H8064"\w* exalted, \w God|strong="H8064"\w*, \w o|strong="H3068"\w*’er \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w*, \w and|strong="H8064"\w* \w your|strong="H3588"\w* glory \w o|strong="H3068"\w*’er \w all|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w earth|strong="H8064"\w*.
